headline: Should ServiceNow’s US$7.75 Billion Armis Deal And AI Security Push Require Action From NOW Investors?
summary: In 2025, ServiceNow accelerated its AI- and security-led expansion by acquiring firms including Logik.io, data.world, Moveworks, Veza, and agreeing to buy Armis in a roughly US$7.75 billion cash deal to deepen security workflows. This push has turned Security and Risk into ServiceNow’s fifth business with more than US$1.00 billion in annual contract value, highlighting how AI-enabled security is becoming a core pillar of its workflow platform. We’ll now examine how ServiceNow’s large Armis...

headline: Dave Broering Joins zeb as Chief Revenue Officer
summary: zeb, a digital transformation consulting firm specializing in AWS, ServiceNow, and Databricks partnerships, today announced the appointment of Dave Broering as Chief Revenue Officer. Broering brings more than 25 years of operational and sales leadership experience to support zeb's accelerated growth in delivering industry-specific AI solutions and deepening strategic technology partnerships.
